name: ModalBarrier
desc: A widget that prevents the user from interacting with widgets behind itself.

fields.name: color
fields.desc: If non-null, fill the barrier with this color.

fields.name: dismissible
fields.desc: Specifies if the barrier will be dismissed when the user taps on it.

fields.name: onDismiss
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.ModalBarrier.onDismiss} Called when the barrier is being dismissed.

fields.name: barrierSemanticsDismissible
fields.desc: Whether the modal barrier semantics are included in the semantics tree.

fields.name: semanticsLabel
fields.desc: Semantics label used for the barrier if it is [dismissible].

fields.name: clipDetailsNotifier
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.ModalBarrier.clipDetailsNotifier} Contains a value of type [EdgeInsets] that specifies how the [SemanticsNode.rect] of the widget should be clipped.
